definitions.text: the piece of land on which something is located (or is to be located)
examples: a good site for the school

definitions.text: physical position in relation to the surroundings
examples: the sites are determined by highly specific sequences of nucleotides

definitions.text: a computer connected to the internet that maintains a series of web pages on the World Wide Web
examples: the Israeli web site was damaged by hostile hackers
The company located some of their agents in Los Angeles
